LUMEN.text: At a restaurant, you're enjoying the conversation so much that you almost never look at the menu until the server arrives to take your order.
When driving, you find yourself wanting to look at your passengers when talking, even while behind the wheel.
You start yard work with great enthusiasm, but within 30 minutes you're chatting joyfully with a neighbor, leaving the task unfinished.
In social situations, you rarely thrust yourself into conversations and only respond when specifically asked.
Your speech is overly expressive and you use exaggeration freely when telling stories.

AETHER.text: You feel you need to have more power than other people around you.
You pride yourself on having a triple 'A' credit rating and always paying bills on time.
When upset, you can be more biting or sarcastic than most people you know.
You balance your checkbook to the penny and take pride in financial accuracy.

ORPHEUS.text: After disciplining a child, you immediately take time to comfort and show love to them.
You find it natural to play with children and feel comfortable spending extended time with them.
When someone shares their problems, you want to quickly fix the situation rather than just listen.
You have a natural aptitude for 'babying' and talking to your plants, showing care for living things.

ORIN.text: Before a trip, you study the map well in advance and prepare thoroughly, knowing the best route from start to finish.
You have every receipt for the past five years, even if they're not in perfect order.
You systemize everything and have a detailed budget with matching records.
Your desk is messy and your files disorganized, but you somehow know where everything is.
You can be found on your hands and knees, 'manicuring' your lawn and hedges with precision.

LYRA.text: You have a ferocious appetite for books and spend significant time reading and learning.
You're drawn to colorful packaging and visual satisfaction when making purchases.
You love charts, diagrams, and graphs because you want to understand where everything fits in the bigger picture.
You prefer getting your news from TV rather than magazines and newspapers.

VARA.text: You compare prices and quality quite carefully when shopping, sometimes creating 'traffic jams' while making decisions.
You never start speaking until you've thought out precisely what you want to say.
When you order at a restaurant, it takes you a long time to decide, but once the food arrives you savor every bite.
In your grocery cart, visual appeal matters more than careful price comparison.

CHRONOS.text: You're the slowest eater among your friends and are invariably the last one finished at meals.
You're the last one to leave an intersection and rarely change lanes while driving.
Late on Saturday morning, you can still be found sipping your third cup of coffee before starting tasks.
When you hate a task, you do it with vengeance at a frenzied pace to get it over with.
You work best under pressure, though you claim you don't like it.

KAEL.text: You're a daring driver who darts in and out of traffic to make up time between appointments.
You bolt down food in big chunks, often talking while chewing.
You're a debater who gets right to the point and isn't afraid to argue.
When shopping, you want to purchase what you need and get out as quickly as possible.
Before making decisions, you carefully avoid any unpleasant confrontations.
